full_summary:
## TBIPS RFP: DEFENCEX Stream 1

### Notice Details

* Reference Number: WS4079116078
* Solicitation Number: WS4079116078
* Publication Date: July 11, 2023
* Tender Closing Date and Time: August 23, 2023, 14:00 EDT
* Amendment Date: August 16, 2023
* Expected Contract Start Date: October 4, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: N/A (Ongoing)

### Tender Status

* Tender Status: Expired
* Trade Agreements: The procurement is open to participants from Canada and participating countries under various free trade agreements.

### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: SRV (Services)
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* Unspsc Code: 80161604 (Information Technology IT Management Services)
* Unspsc Description: Information Technology IT Management Services

### Contracting Entity

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
* End User Entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* End User Entity Address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Point of Contact

* Name: Akkila, Nader (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: nader.akkila@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16836598?extsite=MTY4MzY1OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16836598?extsite=MTY4MzY1OThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Amendment

* The tender closing time for the applicable RFP has been modified to August 23, 2023, 14:00 EDT.
* Only Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Supply Arrangement (SA) holders with a TBIPS SA for Tier 2 in the National Capital Region are eligible to compete for this contract.
